meanings.definition: The quality or state of being abnormal.
meanings.sent1: The abnormities of the situation were quite noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The doctor noted some abnormities in the test results.
meanings.sent3: Despite the abnormities, everyone found humor in the situation.
meanings.sent4: Her unique perspective on life made her abnormities stand out.
meanings.sent5: The abnormities of the painting made it unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The abnormities in his behavior raised concerns.
meanings.sent2: The flower's bright color was an abnormity in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The abnormities in the design made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent4: His abnormities were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The abnormities of the experiment were hard to ignore.
